[00:00.00]t r a n s p a r e n t s o u l (Explicit) - Willow/Travis Barker/Travis Barker
[00:02.30]Lyrics by：Tyler Cole/Travis Barker/Willow Smith
[00:03.18]Composed by：Tyler Cole/Travis Barker/Willow Smith
[00:04.06]One two three four
[00:05.40]
[00:26.82]I don't f**king know if it's a lie or it's a fact
[00:28.97]All your little fake friends will sell your secrets for some cash
[00:31.68]Hey hey
[00:32.15]Smile in my face then put your cig out on my back
[00:34.33]If you ever see me just get to runnin' like the Flash
[00:37.19]
[00:38.01]I knew a boy just like you
[00:40.72]He's a snake just like you
[00:42.85]
[00:43.37]Such a fake just like you
[00:45.21]But I can see the truth
[00:46.98]Transparent soul
[00:50.74]I can see right through just so you know
[00:55.86]
[00:57.86]Transparent soul
[01:01.43]I can see right through just so you know
[01:09.52]I don't f**king know if it's paradise or it's a trap
[01:11.74]Yeah they're treating me like royalty but is it kissin' a*s
[01:14.36]Hey hey
[01:14.89]No one's brave enough to take the fall right
[01:16.92]But it's all your fault why you actin' like it's alright
[01:19.49]
[01:20.71]I knew a girl just like you
[01:22.79]
[01:23.31]She was vain just like you
[01:25.42]
[01:25.97]Such a pain just like you
[01:28.11]And everybody knows the truth
[01:29.89]Transparent soul
[01:33.40]I can see right through just so you know
[01:40.54]Transparent soul
[01:44.22]I can see right through just so you know
[01:49.37]
[01:52.05]It's clear to me now
[01:54.28]
[01:54.79]You're scared of me wow
[01:57.40]It's clear to me now
[01:59.71]
[02:00.89]Transparent soul
[02:02.95]It's clear to me now
[02:05.35]You're scared of me wow
[02:07.98]It's clear to me now
[02:10.48]
[02:11.55]Transparent soul

[02:26.76]I can see right through just so you know

[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.30]//
[00:03.18]//
[00:04.06]一 二 三 四
[00:05.40]
[00:26.82]我不知道这究竟是谎言还是真相
[00:28.97]你所有虚情假意的朋友会为了金钱出卖你的秘密
[00:31.68]//
[00:32.15]我展露笑容 你朝着我的后背吐着烟
[00:34.33]如果你看到我 如闪电侠一般奋力奔跑
[00:37.19]
[00:38.01]我认识一个像你一样的男孩
[00:40.72]他像你一样阴险狡诈
[00:42.85]
[00:43.37]像你一样虚伪做作
[00:45.21]但是我可以看清真相
[00:46.98]透明的灵魂
[00:50.74]如你所知 我可以一眼看穿
[00:55.86]
[00:57.86]透明的灵魂
[01:01.43]如你所知 我可以一眼看穿
[01:09.52]我不知道这究竟是天堂还是陷阱
[01:11.74]他们待我如皇室成员一般 可这是阿谀奉承
[01:14.36]//
[01:14.89]没人有足够的勇气承担所有责任
[01:16.92]但是这都是你的错 你为什么装作若无其事的样子
[01:19.49]
[01:20.71]我认识一个像你一样的女孩
[01:22.79]
[01:23.31]她像你一样贪慕虚荣
[01:25.42]
[01:25.97]像你一样令人苦恼不已
[01:28.11]每个人都知道真相
[01:29.89]透明的灵魂

[01:44.22]如你所知 我可以一眼看穿
[01:49.37]
[01:52.05]现在 在我眼中是如此清晰
[01:54.28]
[01:54.79]你对我恐惧不已
[01:57.40]现在 在我眼中是如此清晰
[01:59.71]
